column4: Offers a large number of courses - free and paid. With Universities like Penn, University of Michigan, Stanford, Johns Hopkins,etc.
Free Online Courses. From School partners like Harvard, MIT, Berkeley, Boston University,etc. Paid Certification is Available
Offers Paid Nanodegree programs and some free courses. Backed by companies like Google, Amazon, Vive and Hackreactor. Helps in building and designing projects.
Offers in-demand courses at cheap prices with private instructors. Helps building and designing projects. Topics ranging from personal development to IT and software.
Learn to Code interactively, for free. CodeAcademy provides courses specifically related to coding, web designing, web development, database,etc.
Learn Web design, Web-dev and coding. Treehouse offers a 7-day free trial after that its $23/month. Choose from 1000s of hours of content., from Js to Python to iOS

TopCoder is one of the original platforms for competitive programming online. 
Challenges include algorithmic challenges, single round matches every month,etc.
CoderByte provides 200+ coding challenges you can solve directly online in one of 10 programming languages. The challenges range form easy to hard.
Project euler provides a large collection of challenges in the domain of cs and mathematics. The challenges involve writing small program to figure out the solution to a Maths formula or equation.
HackerRank provides challenges for several different domains such as Algorithms, Mathematics, Sql,Functional Programming, AI, and more. You can solve all challenges directly online.
CodeChef is an Indian-based competitive programming website that provides challenges. You can write code in an online text editor and view a collection of challenges and solution.
CodeEval is similar to HackerRank where it also provides a collection of company-sponsored coding challenges that can help you get a job if you solve them well.
Codewars provides a large collection of coding challenges submitted and edited by their own community. You can solve the challenges directly online in a text editor in several languages.
LeetCode is a popular Online Judge that provides a list of 190+ challenges that can help you prepare for a technical job interview. You can solve the challenges online in 9 languages.
Learn to Code HTML & CSS has one goal â€” to teach people how to build beautiful and intuitive websites by way of clear and organized lessons.
